title.rendered: ALEXANDRO FRATELLI Runway Show “War For Love” 22/23 Collection – Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered:
ALEXANDRO FRATELLI presented runway show "War For Love" 22/23 Collection for Paris Fashion Week 2022.


By Fashion-editor : Christina V Henningstad  Production: Fashionview
